DOC.HEADLINE: BRAZILIAN KILLED BY BROTHER-IN-LAW FOR PRAISING ITALY DURING WORLD CUP
DOC.TEXT: A Brazilian soccer fan was murdered by his brother-in-law because he praised the Italian team during the World Cup_final , news_agency Estado reported . Jose de Oliveira Lima , 44 , was stabbed to death by Raimundo Leadro in a bar in the remote Amazon city of Rio Branco after Lima said Italy was playing well by denying Brazil a goal , Estado reported Monday.The game ended 0-0 and was won by Brazil on penalty kicks . In another incident , two students in Rio Branco suffered injuries when they were shot as they watched the match in another bar . The women , supporting Italy , were shot at by an infuriated boyfriend . In Campinas , a 51-year-old woman suffered a heart_attack when the match went_into extra_time and she died before reaching hospital .
